title: राजस्थान में पेशाब पिलाने का वीडियो दलित उत्पीड़न के गलत दावे से धड़ल्ले से हो रहा शेयर
author: www.altnews.in
vclaim: [मेवानी के ट्वीट के मूल शब्द – “What the hell? This is absolutely obnoxious, inhuman and horrendous. @ashokgehlot51 government must act now, like right now. Not only all the accused be arrested but an explanation be sought from concerned DM and SP as to what preventive measures did u take to stop such violence?”]
